title: IRC Archive for channel #xwiki on 03 January 2013 - XWiki
content:

11:15 <vmassol> has joined #xwiki  
13:19 <sburjan`> vmassol: hello. I see we still haven't defined any issue for the "browser support" section from Roadmaps/Archives4xCycle. is this document considered obsolete ?  
13:27 <SvenDowideit> has quit  
14:03 <vmassol> sburjan`: hi, I don't understand  
14:36 <jvdrean1> has quit  
14:37 <jvdrean> has joined #xwiki  
14:58 <xwikibot> has joined #xwiki  
15:40 <StefanS\_> has joined #xwiki  
15:41 <StefanS\_> Hi all, need help with xwiki  
15:42 <StefanS\_> I have on XWiki 4.4 an error when exporting PDF  
15:42 <sdumitriu> Hi StefanS\_  
15:42 <sdumitriu> What error?  
15:42 <StefanS\_> Wrapped Exception: .fop (Permission denied)  
15:43 <sdumitriu> Ah  
15:43 <StefanS\_> but the permission is ok  
15:43 <sdumitriu> Tomcat?  
15:43 <sdumitriu> Linux?  
15:43 <StefanS\_> yes Tomcat 6 on FreeBSD  
15:44 <sdumitriu> OK, the problem is that FOP requires write access on the user's home directory  
15:44 <sdumitriu> Does the user under which Tomcat is running have a home directory?  
15:45 <StefanS\_> ah, user is www i will lock on it  
15:46 <sdumitriu> That's a thing that I don't like about FOP, I might go and patch it, since it bites enough XWiki users  
15:47 <sdumitriu> vmassol: The linkchecker is listing too many false bad links, should we disable it? At the moment I consider it noise  
15:47 <vmassol> otp  
15:54 <StefanS\_> perfect sdumitriu, its work now :)  
15:54 <sdumitriu> Great  
15:55 <StefanS\_> a question to LDAP and MS AD, give it here an example ?  
15:55 <sdumitriu> Ask tmortagne  
15:56 <StefanS\_> OK thanks, i will ask him  
16:08 <StefanS\_> has quit  
16:19 <vmassol> back  
16:19 <vmassol> sdumitriu: what false false? At the moment there's a timeout so when you get code = 0 it means the site hasn't answered within the timeout, we could easily not report it when code == 0  
16:19 <vmassol> s/false/false links/  
16:20 <sdumitriu> And twitter doesn't respond?  
16:20 <vmassol> what's the relationship with twitter?  
16:38 <vmassol> anyone else think that https://github.com/xwiki/xwiki-rendering/commit/fdc87a89422e9cc299ca24e2cf210b4053a07ea2#commitcomment-2378665 requires a jira?  
16:39 <vmassol> I'll create one just for sdumitriu  
16:39 <vmassol> it's enough that one person ask about it  
16:39 <tmortagne> event syntax is a bit special since it's pretty much useless for anything than tests but sdumitriu has a point  
16:47 <sburjan`> vmassol: I am talking about http://www.xwiki.org/xwiki/bin/view/Roadmaps/Archives4xCycle .. check the "Make sure browser support is up to date, especially for IE8/9:" section  
16:48 <vmassol> this is archives sburjan`  
16:48 <vmassol> we're now in 4.5  
16:48 <vmassol> and I've sent an email  
16:49 <vmassol> what's your question already sburjan`? :)  
16:49 <vmassol> whether we should work on it or not?  
16:49 <vmassol> I suggest that you reploy to my mail  
16:49 <vmassol> with the list of issues  
16:49 <vmassol> that you think are important for 4.5  
16:51 <sburjan`> vmassol: but I have already sent an e-amil with isues i proposed.  
16:51 <vmassol> yes for 4.x  
16:51 <vmassol> 4.4  
16:51 <vmassol> it's up to you sburjan`  
16:51 <vmassol> if you don't care about them being fixed  
16:51 <vmassol> then don't resend it  
16:51 <vmassol> :)  
16:51 <vmassol> if you do care (which I think you do) then I suggest that you resend it to be sure they're not forgotten  
16:52 <sburjan`> well you tld me that you will talk to the devs and ask them to take a look atthem :)  
16:52 <sburjan`> ok, I will re-activate the thread. I can't no more than re-sending a new e-mail  
16:57 <vmassol> I did  
16:57 <vmassol> but as you may have noticed we're short on time  
16:57 <vmassol> and short on devs  
17:00 <vmassol> sdumitriu: I think we could start by filtering out the playground notifications? I wanted to leave them on a bit to see the kind of traffic we have there but we've seen it now I believe  
17:00 <sdumitriu> +1  
17:45 <sburjan`> has quit  
17:47 <sburjan`> has joined #xwiki

18:06 <sburjan`> has quit  
18:06 <sburjan\_> is now known as <sburjan`>  
18:07 <StefanS> with link and zoom (on mouse click)  
18:08 <vmassol> btw tomorrow I'm off (tmortagne, jvdrean)
